extendedInfo.description: TwitPal is a full-featured twitter client for Android and iPhone. It provides the most innovative and must-have features amongst all twitter client apps.Main Features- Multiple accounts (up to 5) - Push notifications- Selectable background images - Set user photos as background image- Save drafts- Post to Facebook- Save search keywords- Extended menu on titlebar touch- Show threads for search results - Show current tweet limits- Block-user support (show blocked list)- Mute support (show muted users/tweets)- Photo upload (photonui, twitpic, yfrog)- Photo preview (photonui, twitpic, yfrog, twitter.com, instagram, lockerz)- #nowplaying support (sharing from 3rd party music apps)- Add geo code- Control photo resolutions- Support multiple fonts sizes- RT (Edit+RT/Retweet) support - Tweets translation support- Select name or id on timeline- Delete tweets from timeline- FAQ- List support (Create/Delete, Follow/Unfollow, Subscribe/Unsubscribe...) - Profile change (bio and photo) - Send tweets to emails/Kakaotalk/Facebook- Save photos - URL shortening - Select hashtags - TwitLonger support- Reply-All support- Show private accounts - Show my Retweets (Delete support) - Update all button - Shake-to-update support- Link to KoreanTweeters.com to follow Korean celebrities and popular hashtags/retweets

reviews.title: Still Bad.
reviews.comment: Not great. You can only refresh the timeline so many times before getting an error msg. Also, trying to view ur muted users unmutes them.  Update: The error msg. still comes. Only difference is somtimes it fixes itself without you having to restart the app. Other than that, the updated version is exactly the same.
reviews.author: Britney Durham

reviews.title: Needs for update but still
reviews.comment: perfect app .. the best one for ever but needs some Features like : 1- i wont know who make favorite to my tweet .(important) 2-i know that my tweet was retweet but who make it ????????.(important) 3- i want to know who many any tweet in my timeline was retweet or favorite and who make it . 4- i want to alert me for new follower. 5- i want to know how many times my all tweets was favorite . i still use TwitPal but also the original app. for the last Features please please please update it and i give it 5 stars >>>>For information there is no app. support that Features
reviews.author: Ali Hasan

reviews.title: Great Twitter App after Tweetdeck!
reviews.comment: Very light, fully featured, great interface. The most of all, no ads!! After all my searching, this is the best twitter client I adore after Tweetdeck! Thanks for this great app!  Update: I often get message that I must upgrade to API v.1.1. Is that my phone that needs an upgrade or it\'s a bug?
reviews.author: Nugi Apri

reviews.comment: same thing that TweetCaster is doing. Page won\'t load

reviews.comment: Very simple and look gorgeous..!
reviews.author: Ulan Ulano

reviews.title: Unrefined and cumbersome to use
reviews.comment: This Twitter client has an unrefined appearance, not looking nearly as sharp as others, and is very cumbersome to use.  The controls are not very responsive, and following links and hashtags is not the most intuitive.  Additionally, this client introduces the term \"friends\" to refer to one\'s Twitter feed, which is just bizarre.
reviews.author: Ben Schumin
